comment.author: 49578859@N00
comment._content:
Beautiful and very evocative image! I don't know why, but when I see a picture like this, taken so many years ago, I always wonder about the life of the people photographed in it. For example, the second woman from the left, looks so young and beautiful that if she is still alive, she should be now an old lady ... 
Love these images, thanks for sharing!

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Fainted, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 26260013@N06
comment._content: What a beautiful picture.  Its great to know that people really dont change that much.  Everyone looks pretty much the same today as they did back then, yeah seems kind of silly to say that, but it is comforting in a way.  They probably had a lot of the same hopes and dreams as we do today, albeit in differing circumstances.

comment._content: They don't build 'em like that anymore!
